gdpr.name: GDPR
gdpr.description: Full compliance with EU data protection regulations

nis2.name: NIS2
nis2.description: Network and Information Systems Security Directive

complianceSection.title: Simplified Compliance for Your AI Applications
complianceSection.description: Much of the complexity around legislation doesn't arise from cloud technology itself, but from foreign ownership and unclear data access. Our cloud runs in Sweden and is owned by Swedish stakeholders.
complianceSection.callToAction: Take control of your data and simplify your compliance journey with Berget's comprehensive regulatory framework and EU-based infrastructure.

pricing.title: Simple to support your scaling needs
pricing.description: We aim to keep our prices simple and fair, so that you can focus on building awesome stuff instead of trying to figure out your bills.
pricing.tooltip: All prices are in EUR and exclude VAT
pricing.paymentInfo:
Credit card and pre-payment. Invoice possible for large customers.
Automatic top-up when your balance reaches a set threshold.

footer.description: Our mission is to provide the most trustworthy, valuable and sustainable AI-cloud services in Europe.

modelInferenceSection.title: Model Inference
modelInferenceSection.description: Access our extensive collection of powerful open-source models through serverless endpoints. Start building AI applications immediately using the OpenAI API standard.

modelInference.title: Model inference
modelInference.description1: Serverless inference of powerful open-source models. Access our 50+ models including Llama 3, Mixtral, through serverless endpoints and start building your AI applications using the Open AI API standard.
modelInference.description2: It is simple, you can start immediately and you pay as you go.

dedicatedInference.title: Dedicated inference for your scaling needs
dedicatedInference.description: Host any model, open-source, fine-tuned or one that you trained yourself on our dedicated infrastructure as you scale. Load any model, select GPU instances and deploy your own dedicated inference service and endpoint in a heartbeat.

safeCompliantAI.title: Safe and compliant AI
safeCompliantAI.description: With our inference services, your data never leaves the EU, or even our data center. No data - such as prompts and responses - is stored and cannot be accessed by anyone but yourself. This greatly simplifies compliance with EU regulations such as EU AI Act, GDPR, Nis-2 and Dora.

productionGradePerformance.title: Production-grade performance
productionGradePerformance.description: Run inference at scale with predictable cost. You pay for the dedicated resources that serves your model, ensuring production-grade latency and throughput for your applications.

features.openWeightsDescription: We believe in open source and transparency. All our models are available for review and validation.

whatIsGitOps.title: What is GitOps?
whatIsGitOps.description: GitOps is a modern approach to infrastructure and application management using Git as the single source of truth. It enables developers to manage infrastructure and application configurations using Git repositories.

gitRepository.title: Git Repository
gitRepository.description: Your infrastructure as code and application configurations are version controlled in Git.

bergetCluster.title: Berget Cluster
bergetCluster.description: Dedicated GPU resources, isolated network, and encrypted storage for your workloads.

aiApis.title: AI API:s
aiApis.description: You can either use our open models or deploy your own. In any case your data is not leaving our data center.

getStarted.description: Berget AI offers Europe's best and simplest place for your AI applications, making compliance effortless while providing modern developer experience and sustainable infrastructure with no vendor lock-in.

hero.tagline: A responsible, compliant and sustainable AI company for Europe
hero.description: Orchestrate multiple AI agents to work together seamlessly, creating a powerful ecosystem of specialized intelligence.

about.title: We're Not Just Building Another AI Platform
about.subtitle: We're Redefining Trust in AI
about.description: In a world where data is treated like a commodity and privacy is an afterthought, we dared to imagine something different. A platform where technology serves humanity, not the other way around. Where innovation isn't about bypassing trust - it's about building it.

manifesto.intro: Berget isn't just a company. We're a declaration—a dedication to a world where trust accelerates innovation, not hinders it.
manifesto.european: We're European. We're built by citizens who understand that regulations can unlock innovation, not limit it. While others see rules as obstacles, we see them as the blueprint for a more intelligent, more human and open future.
manifesto.vision: We unlock pure, adaptable intelligence for all. We're offering a new paradigm where shared trust creates unprecedented possibilities, where AI becomes a trusted partner in human progress.

joinTeam.title: Join Our Team
joinTeam.description: We're always looking for talented people who share our vision of making AI infrastructure more secure, sustainable, and accessible.

andreas.name: Andreas Lundmark
andreas.bio: Former Partner and Nordic AI Lead at Boston Consulting Group. Deep expertise in enterprise AI transformation.

christian.name: Christian Landgren
christian.bio: Serial entrepreneur and tech innovator. Expert in building developer-first platforms and open source solutions.

john.name: John Angelmo
john.bio: Linux/cloud specialist with 25 years of experience. Former Kubernetes Team Lead at Tele2, expert in automated deployment, configuration management and cloud infrastructure. Deep expertise in Linux, VMware, and security with a strong focus on regulatory compliance.
